formal.zh:
感谢您的邮件。关于{{subject}}，我已收到您的信息。我将在{{timeframe}}内回复您详细的反馈。如有紧急事项，请随时联系我。

此致
敬礼
formal.en:
Thank you for your email regarding {{subject}}. I have received your information and will provide detailed feedback within {{timeframe}}. Please feel free to contact me if there are any urgent matters.

Best regards

casual.zh: 收到！关于{{subject}}的事情我看到了，{{timeframe}}内给你回复。有急事随时找我。
casual.en: Got it! I've seen the {{subject}} matter and will get back to you within {{timeframe}}. Feel free to reach out if it's urgent.

formal.zh:
尊敬的客户，

感谢您对我们产品/服务的关注。关于您咨询的{{subject}}，我们将安排专业人员在{{timeframe}}内为您提供详细解答。

如有其他问题，欢迎随时联系我们。

此致
敬礼
formal.en:
Dear Valued Customer,

Thank you for your interest in our products/services. Regarding your inquiry about {{subject}}, we will arrange for a professional to provide you with detailed answers within {{timeframe}}.

Please feel free to contact us if you have any other questions.

Best regards

formal.zh:
您好，

已收到您的邮件，我将仔细阅读并在{{timeframe}}内回复。

谢谢！
formal.en:
Hello,

I have received your email and will read it carefully and reply within {{timeframe}}.

Thank you!

casual.zh: 收到你的邮件了，我看看然后{{timeframe}}内回复你。
casual.en: Got your email, I'll take a look and get back to you within {{timeframe}}.

formal.zh:
您好，

我目前不在办公室，将于{{return_date}}返回。在此期间，如有紧急事务，请联系{{emergency_contact}}。

谢谢理解！
formal.en:
Hello,

I am currently out of the office and will return on {{return_date}}. For urgent matters during this period, please contact {{emergency_contact}}.

Thank you for your understanding!
